name: ATLANTIC RIM
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 49 (Unstable)
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/49/atlantic-rim

Protect the city! Destroy the target! Keep your mech stable!

The city is under the control of an evil force hidden in the highest tower, waves of robots want to stop you by messing up with your mech’s control… Stop them before it’s too late!

controls

WASD (🎮 left stick) to move
left click (🎮 any button) to attack/interact

Kill the robots to collect scraps so you can charge your laser cannon & keep your mech balanced so you don’t fall.

co-op up to 4 people with gamepads! team

paul lancelot __ art, sfx & music https://twitter.com/Lanceloks

laura nadal __ art, vfx https://twitter.com/mmem1m

nicolas ceriani __ code, animation & additional art https://twitter.com/patayaaaa
